1 var fastMath;
  2 /**
  3 Creates an arrow from a define start point to the end point.  The end point always has an arrow head.
  4 @class THM_Arrow
  5 @param  {object} plugin The monocleGL plugin object.
  6 @param  {object} lyrParent The layer to add the arrow to.
  7 @return {void} Nothing
  8 */
  9 function THM_Arrow(plugin, lyrParent) {
 10 	// Setup local varibles
 11     this.plugin = plugin;
 12 	this.lyrParent = lyrParent;
 13 
 14 	// All the important points for drawing the line
 15 	this.pntStart = new Point(0,0);
 16 	this.pntEnd = new Point(0,0);
 17 	this.pntRight = new Point(0,0);
 18 	this.pntLeft = new Point(0,0);
 19 
 20 	// The vectors of each line
 21 	this.vecMain = new circleVector(0,0);
 22 	this.vecLeft = new circleVector(0,0);
 23 	this.vecRight = new circleVector(0,0);
 24 
 25 	// Arrow presets
 26 	this.numLegLength = 10;
 27 	this.numLegAngle = 135;
 28 
 29 	// Create the singleton class for fast math if it hasn't been created before
 30 	if(fastMath === undefined) {
 31 		fastMath = new THM_fastMath();
 32 	}
 33 
 34 	/**
 35 	Setup the arrow and add it to the passed parent.  Called internally during creation and only needs to called once.
 36 	@param  {void} Nothing
 37 	@return {void} Nothing
 38 	*/
 39 	this.create = function() {
 40 		// Create the 3 lines for the arrow
 41 		this.lineMain = new Line(this.plugin, 0, 0, 0, 0);
 42 		this.lineRight = new Line(this.plugin, 0, 0, 0, 0);
 43 		this.lineLeft = new Line(this.plugin, 0, 0, 0, 0);
 44 
 45 		// Add all the lines to the parent layer
 46 		this.lyrParent.addChild(this.lineMain);
 47 		this.lyrParent.addChild(this.lineRight);
 48 		this.lyrParent.addChild(this.lineLeft);
 49 	};
 50 
 51 	/**
 52 	Set the start point of the arrow and redraw the arrow.
 53 	@param  {number} x The new x position of the start point for the arrow.
 54 	@param  {number} y The new y position of the start point for the arrow.
 55 	@return {void} Nothing
 56 	*/
 57 	this.setStart = function(x,y) {
 58 		this.pntStart.x = x;
 59 		this.pntStart.y = y;
 60 		this.drawArrow();
 61 	};
 62 
 63 	/**
 64 	Set the end point of the arrow and redraw the arrow.
 65 	@param  {number} x The new x position of the end point for the arrow.
 66 	@param  {number} y The new y position of the end point for the arrow.
 67 	@return {void} Nothing
 68 	*/
 69 	this.setEnd = function(x,y) {
 70 		this.pntEnd.x = x;
 71 		this.pntEnd.y = y;
 72 		this.drawArrow();
 73 	};
 74 
 75 	/**
 76 	Set the thickness of each of the lines.
 77 	@param  {number} thickness The new thickness of all the lines used to create the arrow.
 78 	@return {void} Nothing
 79 	*/
 80 	this.setThickness = function(thickness) {
 81 		this.lineMain.setThickness(thickness);
 82 		this.lineRight.setThickness(thickness);
 83 		this.lineLeft.setThickness(thickness);
 84 	};
 85 
 86 	/**
 87 	Set the color of each of the lines.
 88 	@param  {number} r The new amount of red in the lines (range 0 to 1).
 89 	@param  {number} g The new amount of green in the lines (range 0 to 1).
 90 	@param  {number} b The new amount of blue in the lines (range 0 to 1).
 91 	@param  {number} a The new amount of alpha in the lines (range 0 to 1).
 92 	@return {void} Nothing
 93 	*/
 94 	this.setColor = function(r,g,b,a) {
 95 		this.lineMain.setColor(r,g,b,a);
 96 		this.lineRight.setColor(r,g,b,a);
 97 		this.lineLeft.setColor(r,g,b,a);
 98 	};
 99 
100 	/**
101 	Set the length of the both arrow legs and redraw the arrow.
102 	@param  {number} length The new length of the arrow head legs in pixels.
103 	@return {void} Nothing
104 	*/
105 	this.setLegLength = function(length) {
106 		this.numLegLength = length;
107 		this.drawArrow();
108 	};
109 
110 	/**
111 	Set the angle of the both arrow legs and redraw the arrow.
112 	@param  {number} angle The new angle of the arrow head legs in degrees.
113 	@return {void} Nothing
114 	*/
115 	this.setLegAngle = function(angle) {
116 		this.numLegAngle = angle;
117 		this.drawArrow();
118 	};
119 
120 	/**
121 	Draw the arrow based on the start and end point.
122 	@param  {void} Nothing
123 	@return {void} Nothing
124 	*/
125 	this.drawArrow = function() {
126 		// Figure out the vector of the arrow
127 		this.vecMain.radial = distancePoints(this.pntStart, this.pntEnd);
128 		this.vecMain.theta = piecewiseArcTan(this.pntStart, this.pntEnd);
129 
130 		// Set the vector of the right leg
131 		this.vecRight.radial = this.numLegLength;
132 		this.vecRight.theta = this.vecMain.theta + this.numLegAngle;
133 
134 		// Get the point based on the right leg vector and arrow end point
135 		this.pntRight = fastMath.moveVector2D(this.pntEnd,this.vecRight);
136 
137 		// Set the vector of the left leg
138 		this.vecLeft.radial = this.numLegLength;
139 		this.vecLeft.theta = this.vecMain.theta - this.numLegAngle;
140 
141 		// Get the point based on the right leg vector and arrow end point
142 		this.pntLeft = fastMath.moveVector2D(this.pntEnd,this.vecLeft);
143 
144 		// Set both points of the main line
145 		this.lineMain.setPosition(this.pntStart.x, this.pntStart.y);
146 		this.lineMain.setDimensions(this.pntEnd.x, this.pntEnd.y);
147 
148 		// Set both points of the right leg line
149 		this.lineRight.setPosition(this.pntEnd.x, this.pntEnd.y);
150 		this.lineRight.setDimensions(this.pntRight.x, this.pntRight.y);
151 
152 		// Set both points of the left leg line
153 		this.lineLeft.setPosition(this.pntEnd.x, this.pntEnd.y);
154 		this.lineLeft.setDimensions(this.pntLeft.x, this.pntLeft.y);
155 	};
156 
157 	// Create the item
158 	this.create();
159 }
160 THM_Object.prototype = new Osmosis();
161 
162 /**
163 Figure out the arc tan of two points in degrees without using the slow Math librarys.
164 @class piecewiseArcTan
165 @param  {object} pointA The frist point to get the arc tan of.
166 @param  {object} pointB The second point to get the arc tan of.
167 @return {number} The angle of the two points passed in.
168 */
169 function piecewiseArcTan(pointA, pointB) {
170 	// Figure out the x and y deltas
171 	var dx = pointA.x - pointB.x;
172 	var dy = pointA.y - pointB.y;
173 
174 	// Generate the absolute delta values for the line
175 	var absDx = dx;
176 	var absDy = dy;
177 	if (absDx < 0) absDx *= -1;
178 	if (absDy < 0) absDy *= -1;
179 
180 	// Holds the resultant answer
181 	var result = 0;
182 
183 	// Using the octant that the line is in apply the approperate formula
184 	if(dx > 0) {
185 		if(dy > 0) {
186 			if(absDx < absDy) {
187 				// Octant 1
188 				result = 1 + (1 - (absDx/absDy));
189 			} else {
190 				// Octant 0
191 				result = absDy / absDx;
192 			}
193 		} else {
194 			if(absDx > absDy) {
195 				// Octant 7
196 				result = 7 + (1 - (absDy / absDx));
197 			} else {
198 				// Octant 6
199 				result = 6 + (absDx / absDy);
200 			}
201 		}
202 	} else {
203 		if(dy < 0) {
204 			if(absDx < absDy) {
205 				// Octant 5
206 				result = 5 + (1 - (absDx / absDy));
207 			} else {
208 				// Octant 4
209 				result = 4 + (absDy / absDx);
210 			}
211 		} else {
212 			if(absDx > absDy) {
213 				// Octant 3
214 				result = 3 + (1 - (absDy / absDx));
215 			} else {
216 				// Octant 2
217 				result = 2 + (absDx / absDy);
218 			}
219 		}
220 	}
221 
222 	// Scale the result to be between 0-359
223 	result = 270 - (result * 45);
224 	if(result < 0) result += 360;
225 
226 	return result;
227 }

229 var mediaURL, slugUUID;
230 /**
231 Build a demo from the passed in demo configuration.
232 @class buildDemo
233 @param  {object} plugin The monocleGL plugin object.
234 @param  {string} media The URL location of the images resources.
235 @param  {object} demoJSON The demo JSON configuration to build the demo off of.
236 @return {void} Nothing
237 */
238 function buildDemo(plugin, media, demoJSON) {
239 	// Read the mediaURL and slugUUID from JSON
240 	mediaURL = readJSON(demoJSON.mediaURL, "media url", media);
241 	slugUUID = readJSON(demoJSON.slug, "demo slug", "");
242 
243 	// Create a new template for the demo
244 	var p = plugin;
245 	monoclegl_initialize(p);
246 	var numQuestions = readJSON(demoJSON.questions.length, "Number of questions", 1);
247 	var thmDemo = new THP_Template(p, 545, 371, numQuestions);
248 	window.thmDemo = thmDemo;
249 
250 	// Read the demo instructions and title from JSON
251 	thmDemo.setInstructionText(readJSON(demoJSON.instructions, "demo instructions", "demo instructions"));
252 	thmDemo.setTitle(readJSON(demoJSON.title, "demo title", "demo title"));
253 
254 	// If the question array exist then start adding questions
255 	if(demoJSON.questions !== undefined) {
256 		for(var i = 0; i < demoJSON.questions.length; i++) {
257 			var strType = readJSON(demoJSON.questions[i].type, "question " + i + " type", "ordering");
258 
259 			// Create an ordering question
260 			if(strType === "ordering") {
261 				thmDemo.sceneArray[i] = new THM_OrderingQuestion(p, demoJSON.questions[i]);
262 
263 			// Create a matching question
264 			} else if(strType === "matching") {
265 				thmDemo.sceneArray[i] = new THM_MatchingQuestion(p, demoJSON.questions[i]);
266 
267 			// Create a placement question
268 			} else if(strType === "placement") {
269 				thmDemo.sceneArray[i] = new THM_PlacementQuestion(p, demoJSON.questions[i]);
270 
271 			// Create a labeling question
272 			} else if(strType === "labeling") {
273 				thmDemo.sceneArray[i] = new THM_LabelingQuestion(p, demoJSON.questions[i], thmDemo);
274 
275 			// Create a concept map question
276 			} else if(strType === "concept_map") {
277 				thmDemo.sceneArray[i] = new THM_ConceptMapQuestion(p, demoJSON.questions[i], thmDemo);
278 
279 
280 			// Create a click on target question
281 			} else if(strType === "click_on_target") {
282 				thmDemo.sceneArray[i] = new THM_ClickOnTargetQuestion(p, demoJSON.questions[i], thmDemo);
283 			}
284 		}
285 	}
286 	// Start the demo already
287 	thmDemo.begin();
288 }
289 window.buildDemo = buildDemo;/**
290 The target element built by JSON.
291 @class THM_Target
292 @param  {object} plugin The monocleGL plugin object.
293 @param  {object} lyrParent The layer to add the target to.
294 @param  {number} numTarget The number of the target, this value will be returned from a callback.
295 @param  {object} jTarget The JSON configuration for this target.
296 @return {void} Nothing
297 */
298 function THM_Target (plugin, lyrParent, numTarget, jTarget) {
299 	this.plugin = plugin;
300 	this.lyrParent = lyrParent;
301 	this.numTarget = numTarget;
302 	this.jTarget = jTarget;
303 	this.funcClick = undefined;
304 	this.funcScope = undefined;
305 	this.bHit = false;
306 
307 	/**
308 	Setup the target and add it to the passed parent.  Called internally during creation and only needs to called once.
309 	@param  {void} Nothing
310 	@return {void} Nothing
311 	*/
312 	this.create = function() {
313 		// Read the x,y location the width and height of the target
314 		this.x = parseInt(readJSON(this.jTarget.x, "target x","0"),10);
315 		this.y = parseInt(readJSON(this.jTarget.y, "target y","0"),10);
316 		this.width = parseInt(readJSON(this.jTarget.width, "target width","32"),10);
317 		this.height = parseInt(readJSON(this.jTarget.height, "target height","32"),10);
318 
319 		// Read the image names for the 3 target states
320 		this.strImgEnabled = readJSON(this.jTarget.imageEnabled, "target enabled image","");
321 		this.strImgDisabled = readJSON(this.jTarget.imageDisabled, "target disabled image","");
322 		this.strImgHit = readJSON(this.jTarget.imageHit, "target hit image","");
323 
324 		// Read weather the target should be hit or not to be correct.
325 		this.correct = readJSON(this.jTarget.correct, "target correctness","false") === "true";
326 
327 		// The background layer of the target
328 		this.lyrBG = new Layer(this.plugin, this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
329 		this.lyrBG.setColor(0,0,0,0);
330 
331 		// Create all the sprites for the target
332 		this.sprEnabled = new Sprite(this.plugin, mediaURL + slugUUID + this.strImgEnabled, 0, 0, this.width, this.height);
333 		this.sprEnabled.downCallback(this, "targetClick");
334 		this.sprDisabled = new Sprite(this.plugin, mediaURL + slugUUID + this.strImgDisabled, 0, 0, this.width, this.height);
335 		this.sprHit = new Sprite(this.plugin, mediaURL + slugUUID + this.strImgHit, 0, 0, this.width, this.height);
336 
337 		// If the enabled sprite is not empty add it to the layer
338 		if(this.strImgEnabled !== "") {
339 			this.sprEnabled.setVisibility(false);
340 			this.lyrBG.addChild(this.sprEnabled);
341 		}
342 
343 		// If the disabled sprite is not empty add it to the layer
344 		if(this.strImgDisabled !== "") {
345 			this.sprDisabled.setVisibility(false);
346 			this.lyrBG.addChild(this.sprDisabled);
347 		}
348 
349 		// If the hit sprite is not empty add it to the layer
350 		if(this.strImgHit !== "") {
351 			this.sprHit.setVisibility(false);
352 			this.lyrBG.addChild(this.sprHit);
353 		}
354 
355 		// Add the background layer to the parent layer
356 		this.lyrParent.addChild(this.lyrBG);
357 	};
358 
359 	/**
360 	The callback that gets triggered whenever user clicks on the target.
361 	@param  {number} x The x position of the mouse.
362 	@param  {number} y The y position of the mouse.
363 	@return {void} Nothing
364 	*/
365 	this.targetClick = function(x,y) {
366 		this.isClicked(this.numTarget);
367 	};
368 
369 	/**
370 	This callback notifies the demo when a target is clicked.
371 	@param  {number} numObject The value to passed along to the demo.
372 	@return {void} Nothing
373 	*/
374 	this.isClicked = function(numObject) {
375 		if(this.funcClick !== undefined && this.funcScope !== undefined) {
376 			this.funcClick.apply(this.funcScope, arguments);
377 		}
378 	};
379 
380 	/**
381 	Subscribe the target and show the enabled sprite.
382 	@param  {void} Nothing
383 	@return {void} Nothing
384 	*/
385 	this.enable = function() {
386 		this.clear();
387 		this.sprEnabled.subscribe();
388 	};
389 
390 	/**
391 	Unsubscribe the target and show the disabled sprite.
392 	@param  {void} Nothing
393 	@return {void} Nothing
394 	*/
395 	this.disable = function() {
396 		this.sprEnabled.setVisibility(false);
397 		this.sprHit.setVisibility(false);
398 		this.sprDisabled.setVisibility(true);
399 		this.sprEnabled.unsubscribe();
400 	};
401 
402 	/**
403 	Show the hit sprite and set the hit boolean.
404 	@param  {void} Nothing
405 	@return {void} Nothing
406 	*/
407 	this.hit = function() {
408 		this.sprEnabled.setVisibility(false);
409 		this.sprDisabled.setVisibility(false);
410 		this.sprHit.setVisibility(true);
411 		this.bHit = true;
412 	};
413 
414 	/**
415 	Show the enabled sprite and clear the hit boolean.
416 	@param  {void} Nothing
417 	@return {void} Nothing
418 	*/
419 	this.clear = function() {
420 		this.sprDisabled.setVisibility(false);
421 		this.sprHit.setVisibility(false);
422 		this.sprEnabled.setVisibility(true);
423 		this.bHit = false;
424 	};
425 
426 	/**
427 	Toggle inbetween the hit and enabled sprites.
428 	@param  {void} Nothing
429 	@return {void} Nothing
430 	*/
431 	this.toggle = function() {
432 		if(this.bHit) {
433 			this.clear();
434 		} else {
435 			this.hit();
436 		}
437 	};
438 
439 	/**
440 	Show the answer for the this target.
441 	@param  {void} Nothing
442 	@return {void} Nothing
443 	*/
444 	this.showAnswer = function() {
445 		if(this.correct) {
446 			this.hit();
447 		} else {
448 			this.clear();
449 		}
450 	};
451 
452 	/**
453 	Check if the hit boolean matchs JSON correct answer.
454 	@param  {void} Nothing
455 	@return {boolean} True if this target is set corectly and false otherwise.
456 	*/
457 	this.check = function() {
458 		return this.correct === this.bHit;
459 	};
460 
461 	this.create();
462 }
463 THM_Target.prototype = new Osmosis();
464 
465 /**
466 The target map style question built by JSON
467 @class THM_ClickOnTargetQuestion
468 @param  {object} plugin The monocleGL plugin object.
469 @param  {object} configuration The JSON configuration for this question.
470 @param  {object} thmDemo The refernce to the THM_Template object for inheritence.
471 @return {void} Nothing
472 */
473 function THM_ClickOnTargetQuestion (plugin, configuration, thmDemo) {
474 	// Scene specfic values
475 	this.plugin = plugin;
476 	this.thmDemo = thmDemo;
477 	this.scenes = this.thmDemo.sceneArray;
478     this.id = this.plugin.newScene();
479     this.strInstruction = readJSON(configuration.text, "configuration text","Question text");
480     this.strName = readJSON(configuration.name, "configuration name","untitled");
481     this.strInherit = readJSON(configuration.inherit, "configuration inheritence","");
482 
483     // Question status flags
484     this.tries = 3;
485     this.correct = false;
486     this.completed = false;
487     this.serverStatus = false;
488 
489 	// Setup the background layer
490     this.bgLayer = new Layer(this.plugin, 0, 0, 480, 320);
491     this.bgLayer.setColor(0, 0, 0, 0);
492 
493 	// The shared and current target list
494     this.allTargets = [];
495     this.currentTargets = [];
496     this.last = -1;
497 
498 	/**
499 	This callback notifies the demo when a target is clicked.
500 	@param  {number} numTarget The value to passed along to the demo.
501 	@return {void} Nothing
502 	*/
503 	this.isClicked = function(numTarget) {
504 		// If single answer mode is on and the last number is valid then clear that target
505 		if(this.last !== -1 && this.last !== numTarget && !this.multipleAnswers) {
506 			this.allTargets[this.last].clear();
507 		}
508 
509 		// Toggle the selected target
510 		this.allTargets[numTarget].toggle();
511 
512 		// Record the is targets number for next time
513 		this.last = numTarget;
514 	};
515 
516 	/**
517 	Overload the initialize function for a target map question.
518 	@param  {void} Nothing
519 	@return {void} Nothing
520 	*/
521 	this.initQuiz = function() {
522 		logDebug("Click on target map question initQuiz()");
523 		var i = 0;
524 
525 		// If no inheritence is specified then create everything from scratch
526 		if(this.strInherit === "") {
527 			// Demo layout varibles
528 			this.layoutX = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.x, "configuration x","20"),10);
529 			this.layoutY = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.y, "configuration y","20"),10);
530 			this.layoutWidth = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.width, "configuration width","440"),10);
531 			this.layoutHeight = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.height, "configuration height","220"),10);
532 
533 			// The dragable background image for the target
534 			this.strImage = readJSON(configuration.image, "configuration image","");
535 			this.intImageWidth = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.image_width, "configuration image width","480"),10);
536 			this.intImageHeight = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.image_height, "configuration image height","320"),10);
537 
538 			// If the image is defined then create the sprite
539 			if(this.strImage !== "") {
540 				// Create the background sprite
541 				this.sprImage = new Sprite(this.plugin, mediaURL + slugUUID + this.strImage, 0, 0, this.intImageWidth, this.intImageHeight);
542 
543 				// Create the layer that drags everything added to it
544 				this.lyrDrag = new Layer(this.plugin, 0, 0, this.intImageWidth, this.intImageHeight);
545 				this.lyrDrag.setColor(0,0,0,0);
546 
547 				// Create the drop down layer that helps control if the drop downs are visiblity
548 				this.lyrDrop = new Layer(this.plugin, 0, 0, this.intImageWidth, this.intImageHeight);
549 				this.lyrDrop.setColor(0,0,0,0);
550 
551 				// If smaller then the defined layout size
552 				if(this.layoutWidth >= this.intImageWidth && this.layoutHeight >= this.intImageHeight) {
553 					// Center the target map in the layout
554 					var pntDrag = new Point();
555 					pntDrag.x = this.layoutX + (this.layoutWidth * 0.5) - (this.intImageWidth * 0.5);
556 					pntDrag.y = this.layoutY + (this.layoutHeight * 0.5) - (this.intImageHeight * 0.5);
557 					this.lyrDrag.setPosition(pntDrag.x, pntDrag.y);
558 				// If Larger then the defined layout size
559 				} else {
560 					// Set the target map to be dragable
561 					var rectDrag = new Rectangle();
562 					rectDrag.x = this.layoutWidth - this.intImageWidth;
563 					rectDrag.y = this.layoutHeight - this.intImageHeight;
564 					rectDrag.width = this.layoutX + this.intImageWidth - rectDrag.x;
565 					rectDrag.height = this.layoutY + this.intImageHeight - rectDrag.y;
566 					this.lyrDrag.setDrag(undefined, undefined, rectDrag);
567 				}
568 
569 				// Add everything to the scene
570 				this.lyrDrag.addChild(this.sprImage);
571 				this.lyrDrag.addChild(this.lyrDrop);
572 				this.bgLayer.addChild(this.lyrDrag);
573 
574 			// If no back ground image is defined then throw an error
575 			} else {
576 				logError("Click on target questions require a background image.");
577 			}
578 		// If inheritence is specified then reference everything from the define scene
579 		} else {
580 			// Look for the parent scene in the scene array
581 			var parentScene = undefined;
582 			var parentName = "";
583 			for (i = 0 ; i < this.scenes.length; i++) {
584 				parentName = readJSON(this.scenes[i].strName, "inherited name for scene " + i, "");
585 				if(parentName === this.strInherit) parentScene = i;
586 			}
587 
588 			// If a parent scene was found then reference some of the varibles from that scene
589 			if ( parentScene !== undefined) {
590 				// Reference the layout from the parent scene
591 				this.layoutX = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].layoutX, "parent scene width","20"),10);
592 				this.layoutY = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].layoutY, "parent scene height","20"),10);
593 				this.layoutWidth = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].layoutWidth, "parent scene width","440"),10);
594 				this.layoutHeight = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].layoutHeight, "parent scene height","220"),10);
595 
596 				// Reference the image from the parent scene
597 				this.intImageWidth = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].intImageWidth, "parent scene image width","100"),10);
598 				this.intImageHeight = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].intImageHeight, "parent scene image height","100"),10);
599 				this.strImage = readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].strImage, "parent scene image","");
600 				this.sprImage = readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].sprImage, "parent scene sprite",undefined);
601 
602 				// If the image was found then add it to this scene
603 				if(this.strImage !== "") {
604 					this.lyrDrag = readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].lyrDrag, "parent scene drag layer","");
605 					this.lyrDrop = readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].lyrDrop, "parent scene drop down layer","");
606 					this.bgLayer.addChild(this.lyrDrag);
607 				}
608 
609 				// Refernce the global target list from the parent scene
610 				this.allTargets = readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].allTargets, "parent scene targets",[0,0,0]);
611 			// If no parent scene was for the throw an error
612 			} else {
613 				logError("Unable to inherit from the scene " + this.strInherit);
614 			}
615 		}
616 
617 		// Load non-inheritable varibles from the configuration
618 		this.textHeight = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.text_height, "configuration text height","50"),10);
619 		this.tweenX = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.tween_x, "configuration tween x position","20"),10);
620 		this.tweenY = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.tween_y, "configuration tween y position","20"),10);
621 		this.multipleAnswers = readJSON(configuration.multiple_answers, "configuration targets","false") === "true";
622 		this.currentTargets = readJSON(configuration.targets, "configuration targets",[0,0,0]);
623 
624 		// Record the range of the targets for this question
625 		this.enableFrom = this.allTargets.length;
626 		this.enableTo = this.allTargets.length + this.currentTargets.length;
627 
628 		// Add all the targets to the global
629 		for(i = 0; i < this.currentTargets.length; i++) {
630 			this.allTargets.push(new THM_Target(this.plugin, this.lyrDrop, this.enableFrom + i, this.currentTargets[i]));
631 			this.allTargets[this.enableFrom + i].funcClick = this.isClicked;
632 			this.allTargets[this.enableFrom + i].funcScope = this;
633 		}
634 
635 		// Create a semi-transparent rectangle behind the instructions to ease readability
636 		var rectInstruction = new Primitive(this.plugin, "rectangle", 10, 288 - this.textHeight, 460, this.textHeight);
637 		rectInstruction.setColor(1.0,1.0,1.0,0.8);
638 		this.bgLayer.addChild(rectInstruction);
639 	};
640 
641 
642 	/**
643 	Overload the display function for a target map question.
644 	@param  {void} Nothing
645 	@return {void} Nothing
646 	*/
647 	this.loadQuiz = function() {
648 		logDebug("Click on target question loadQuiz()");
649 
650 		// Allow dragging and tween the background to the define position
651 		this.lyrDrag.subscribe();
652 		this.lyrDrag.addTween("x:"+this.tweenX+",y:"+this.tweenY+",time:1");
653 
654 		// Show the drop down menus
655 		this.lyrDrop.setVisibility(true);
656 
657 		// Show the answers for any targets from previous questions
658 		for(var i = 0; i < this.enableFrom; i++) {
659 			this.allTargets[i].disable();
660 		}
661 
662 		// Enable any targets from this questions
663 		for(i = this.enableFrom; i < this.enableTo; i++) {
664 			this.allTargets[i].enable();
665 		}
666 
667 		// Disable any targets from future questions
668 		for(i = this.enableTo; i < this.allTargets.length; i++) {
669 			this.allTargets[i].disable();
670 		}
671 
672 		// Reset the last select target to be -1
673 		this.last = -1;
674 	};

680 	*/
681 	this.cleanUp = function() {
682 		logDebug("Click on target question cleanUp()");
683 		// Resize the image to it's original size and unsubscribe it
684 		this.lyrDrag.unsubscribe();
685 	};

706 			this.allTargets[i].showAnswer();

720 			if(!this.allTargets[i].check()) bResult = false;

722 		return bResult;
723 	};

852 THM_ClickOnTargetQuestion.prototype = new Osmosis();
853 /**
854 Color storage and conversion object.
855 @class THM_Color
856 @param  {number} r The new amount of red (range 0 to 1).
857 @param  {number} g The new amount of green (range 0 to 1).
858 @param  {number} b The new amount of blue (range 0 to 1).
859 @param  {number} a The new amount of alpha (range 0 to 1).
860 @return {void} Nothing
861 */
862 function THM_Color(r, g, b, a) {
863 
864 	if(r === undefined) { this.r = 0; } else { this.r = r; }
865 	if(g === undefined) { this.g = 0; } else { this.g = g; }
866 	if(b === undefined) { this.b = 0; } else { this.b = b; }
867 	if(a === undefined) { this.a = 0; } else { this.a = a; }
868 
869 	/**
870 	Convert a hexdecimal string to openGL color ranges
871 	@param  {string} strHex A 6 charactor string for 24 bit color or a 8 charactor string for 32 bit color
872 	@return {void} Nothing
873 	*/
874 	this.convertHex = function(strHex) {
875 		var numHex = parseInt(strHex, 16);
876 
877 		// Check if the color is 24 or 32 bit
878 		if(strHex.length === 8) {
879 			this.r = ((numHex >> 24) & 0xFF) / 0xFF;
880 			this.g = ((numHex >> 16) & 0xFF) / 0xFF;
881 			this.b = ((numHex >> 8) & 0xFF) / 0xFF;
882 			this.a = (numHex & 0xFF) / 0xFF;
883 		} else {
884 			this.r = ((numHex >> 16) & 0xFF) / 0xFF;
885 			this.g = ((numHex >> 8) & 0xFF) / 0xFF;
886 			this.b = (numHex & 0xFF) / 0xFF;
887 			this.a = 1.0;
888 		}
889 	};
890 
891 	/**
892 	Convert from standard color range (0-255) to openGL color range (0-1)
893 	@param  {number} newR The new amount of red (range 0 to 255).
894 	@param  {number} newG The new amount of green (range 0 to 255).
895 	@param  {number} newB The new amount of blue (range 0 to 255).
896 	@param  {number} newA The new amount of alpha (range 0 to 255).
897 	@return {void} Nothing
898 	*/
899 	this.convertRGBA = function(newR, newG, newB, newA) {
900 		this.r = newR / 0xFF;
901 		this.g = newG / 0xFF;
902 		this.b = newB / 0xFF;
903 		this.a = newA / 0xFF;
904 	};
905 
906 	/**
907 	No conversion just a direct copy.
908 	@param  {number} newR The new amount of red (range 0 to 1).
909 	@param  {number} newG The new amount of green (range 0 to 1).
910 	@param  {number} newB The new amount of blue (range 0 to 1).
911 	@param  {number} newA The new amount of alpha (range 0 to 1).
912 	@return {void} Nothing
913 	*/
914 	this.setColor = function(newR, newG, newB, newA) {
915 		this.r = newR;
916 		this.g = newG;
917 		this.b = newB;
918 		this.a = newA;
919 	};
920 }
921 /**
922 The relationship element built by JSON
923 @class THM_Relationship
924 @param  {object} plugin The monocleGL plugin object.
925 @param  {object} lyrParent The layer to add the relationship to.
926 @param  {object} jRelationship The JSON configuration for this relationship.
927 @return {void} Nothing
928 */
929 function THM_Relationship (plugin, lyrParent, jRelationship) {
930 	this.plugin = plugin;
931 	this.lyrParent = lyrParent;
932 	this.jRelationship = jRelationship;
933 
934 	/**
935 	Setup the relationship and add it to the passed parent.  Called internally during creation and only needs to called once.
936 	@param  {void} Nothing
937 	@return {void} Nothing
938 	*/
939 	this.create = function() {
940 		// Read the relationship details from JSON
941 		this.x = parseInt(readJSON(this.jRelationship.x, "relationship x","0"), 10);
942 		this.y = parseInt(readJSON(this.jRelationship.y, "relationship y","0"), 10);
943 		this.width = parseInt(readJSON(this.jRelationship.width, "relationship width","80"), 10);
944 		this.height = parseInt(readJSON(this.jRelationship.height, "relationship height","20"), 10);
945 		this.strAnswer = readJSON(this.jRelationship.answer, "relationship answer","");
946 		this.arrOptions = readJSON(this.jRelationship.options, "relationship options",[""]);
947 
948 		// Collect the arrow information
949 		this.arrow_start_x = parseInt(readJSON(this.jRelationship.arrow_start_x, "relationship arrow start x","0"), 10);
950 		this.arrow_start_y = parseInt(readJSON(this.jRelationship.arrow_start_y, "relationship arrow start y","0"), 10);
951 		this.arrow_end_x = parseInt(readJSON(this.jRelationship.arrow_end_x, "relationship arrow end x","0"), 10);
952 		this.arrow_end_y = parseInt(readJSON(this.jRelationship.arrow_end_y, "relationship arrow end y","0"), 10);
953 		this.arrow_thickness = parseInt(readJSON(this.jRelationship.arrow_thickness, "relationship arrow thickness","2"), 10);
954 		this.arrow_color = new THM_Color();
955 		this.arrow_color.convertHex(readJSON(this.jRelationship.arrow_color, "relationship arrow color","000000"));
956 
957 		// Create the layer for each item
958 		this.lyrBG = new Layer(this.plugin, this.x, this.y, this.width, 20);
959 		this.lyrBG.setColor(0,0,0,0);
960 		this.id = this.lyrBG.id;
961 
962 		// If the arrow is not using all of the default positions then create an arrow for this relationship
963 		if(this.arrow_start_x !== 0 && this.arrow_start_y !== 0 && this.arrow_end_x !== 0 && this.arrow_end_y !== 0) {
964 			this.arrow = new THM_Arrow(this.plugin, this.lyrParent);
965 			this.arrow.setStart(this.arrow_start_x, this.arrow_start_y);
966 			this.arrow.setEnd(this.arrow_end_x, this.arrow_end_y);
967 			this.arrow.setThickness(this.arrow_thickness);
968 			this.arrow.setColor(this.arrow_color.r, this.arrow_color.g, this.arrow_color.b, this.arrow_color.a);
969 		}
970 
971 		// The color overlay of the drop down
972 		this.lyrColor = new Layer(this.plugin, 0, -(20 - this.height), this.width, 20);
973 		this.lyrColor.setColor(0,0,0,0);
974 
975 		// Create the drop down menu for the relationship
976 		this.dd = new DropDown(this.plugin, 0, 0, this.width, this.height);
977 		this.dd.addOption("Select One");
978 		this.dd.setDefaultOption("Select One");
979 
980 		// Set the drop down menu options
981 		for(var i = 0; i < this.arrOptions.length; i++) {
982 			this.dd.addOption(this.arrOptions[i]);
983 		}
984 
985 		// Put the drop down and overlay on the background layer
986 		this.lyrBG.addChild(this.dd);
987 		this.lyrBG.addChild(this.lyrColor);
988 		this.lyrParent.addChild(this.lyrBG)
989 	};
990 
991 	/**
992 	Subscribe the drop down and clear the color overlay.
993 	@param  {void} Nothing
994 	@return {void} Nothing
995 	*/
996 	this.enable = function() {
997 		// Subscribe and reset drop down
998 		this.dd.subscribe();
999 		this.dd.setText("Select One");
1000 
1001 		// Move the layer to the front
1002 		this.lyrParent.removeChild(this.lyrBG);
1003 		this.lyrParent.addChild(this.lyrBG);
1004 
1005 		// Tween the color overlay to be clear
1006 		this.lyrColor.removeTween();
1007 		this.lyrColor.addTween("red:0,green:0,blue:0,alpha:0,time:1");
1008 	};
1009 
1010 	/**
1011 	Unsubscribe the drop down and set a grey color overlay.
1012 	@param  {void} Nothing
1013 	@return {void} Nothing
1014 	*/
1015 	this.disable = function() {
1016 		// Unsubscribe and reset drop down
1017 		this.dd.unsubscribe();
1018 		this.dd.setText("Select One");
1019 
1020 		// Tween the color overlay to be grey
1021 		this.lyrColor.removeTween();
1022 		this.lyrColor.addTween("red:0,green:0,blue:0,alpha:0.33,time:1");
1023 	};
1024 
1025 	/**
1026 	Unsubscribe the drop down and set a green color overlay.
1027 	@param  {void} Nothing
1028 	@return {void} Nothing
1029 	*/
1030 	this.showAnswer = function() {
1031 		// Unsubscribe and set drop down to show the answer
1032 		this.dd.unsubscribe();
1033 		this.dd.setText(this.strAnswer);
1034 
1035 		// Tween the color overlay to be red
1036 		this.lyrColor.removeTween();
1037 		this.lyrColor.addTween("red:0.5,green:1.0,blue:0.45,alpha:0.33,time:1");
1038 	};
1039 
1040 	/**
1041 	Check if the drop down is correct and animate the color overlay.
1042 	@param  {void} Nothing
1043 	@return {void} Nothing
1044 	*/
1045 	this.check = function() {
1046 		var bResult = this.dd.getText() === this.strAnswer;
1047 
1048 		// Stop and previous tweens and tween the overlay based on the result
1049 		this.lyrColor.removeTween();
1050 		if(bResult) {
1051 			// If correct tween overlay to be green
1052 			this.lyrColor.addTween("red:0.5,green:1.0,blue:0.45,alpha:0.33,time:1");
1053 		} else {
1054 			// If incorrect tween overlay to be red
1055 			this.lyrColor.addTween("red:1.0,green:0.22,blue:0.25,alpha:0.33,time:1");
1056 		}
1057 		// Tween the overlay back to be clear with a 1 second delay
1058 		this.lyrColor.addTween("red:0,green:0,blue:0,alpha:0,delay:1,time:1");
1059 		return bResult;
1060 	};
1061 
1062 	this.create();
1063 }
1064 THM_Relationship.prototype = new Osmosis();

1066 /**
1067 The background layer with all the concepts and relationships on it for dragging
1068 @class THM_ConceptMap
1069 @param  {object} plugin The monocleGL plugin object.
1070 @param  {object} lyrParent The layer to add the concepts to.
1071 @param  {object} jConcepts The JSON configuration for this concepts.
1072 @return {void} Nothing
1073 */
1074 function THM_ConceptMap (plugin, parentLayer, jConcepts) {
1075 	this.plugin = plugin;
1076 	this.parentLayer = parentLayer;
1077 	this.jConcepts = jConcepts;
1078 	this.concepts = [];
1079 
1080 	/**
1081 	Create the concept map based on the JSON definations.  Called internally during creation and only needs to called once.
1082 	@param  {void} Nothing
1083 	@return {void} Nothing
1084 	*/
1085 	this.create = function() {
1086 		var i;
1087 
1088 		// Set the region varibles
1089 		this.x = 0;
1090 		this.y = 0;
1091 		this.width = 0;
1092 		this.height = 0;
1093 
1094 		// Create a background layer to attached all the objects to
1095 		this.bgLayer = new Layer(this.plugin, this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
1096 		this.bgLayer.setColor(0, 0, 0, 0);
1097 		this.id = this.bgLayer.id;
1098 
1099 		// Add the background layer to the parent
1100 		this.parentLayer.addChild(this.bgLayer);
1101 
1102 		// Add each of the defined objects to the concept map
1103 		var maxX, maxY;
1104 		for(i = 0; i < this.jConcepts.length; i++) {
1105 
1106 			// Create the object
1107 			this.concepts[i] = new THM_Object(this.plugin, this.bgLayer, i, this.jConcepts[i]);
1108 			maxX = this.concepts[i].x + this.concepts[i].width;
1109 			maxY = this.concepts[i].y + this.concepts[i].height;
1110 
1111 			// If the new object is outside hte current region then update the region
1112 			if(this.width < maxX) this.width = maxX;
1113 			if(this.height < maxY) this.height = maxY;
1114 		}
1115 
1116 		// Reset the dimensions to cover the concept map region
1117 		this.bgLayer.setDimensions(this.width,this.height);
1118 	};
1119 
1120 	this.create();
1121 }
1122 THM_ConceptMap.prototype = new Osmosis();
1123 
1124 /**
1125 The concept map style question built by JSON
1126 @class THM_ConceptMapQuestion
1127 @param  {object} plugin The monocleGL plugin object.
1128 @param  {object} configuration The JSON configuration for this question.
1129 @param  {object} thmDemo The refernce to the THM_Template object for inheritence.
1130 @return {void} Nothing
1131 */
1132 function THM_ConceptMapQuestion (plugin, configuration, thmDemo) {
1133 
1134 	// Scene specfic values
1135 	this.plugin = plugin;
1136 	this.thmDemo = thmDemo;
1137 	this.scenes = this.thmDemo.sceneArray;
1138     this.id = this.plugin.newScene();
1139     this.strInstruction = readJSON(configuration.text, "configuration text","Question text");
1140     this.strName = readJSON(configuration.name, "configuration name","untitled");
1141     this.strInherit = readJSON(configuration.inherit, "configuration inheritence","");
1142 
1143     // Question status flags
1144     this.tries = 3;
1145     this.correct = false;
1146     this.completed = false;
1147     this.serverStatus = false;
1148 
1149 	// Setup the background layer
1150     this.bgLayer = new Layer(this.plugin, 0, 0, 480, 320);
1151     this.bgLayer.setColor(0, 0, 0, 0);
1152 
1153     // The shared and current relationships list
1154     this.allRelationships = [];
1155     this.currentRelationships = [];
1156 
1157 	/**
1158 	Overload the initialize function for a concept map question.
1159 	@param  {void} Nothing
1160 	@return {void} Nothing
1161 	*/
1162 	this.initQuiz = function() {
1163 		logDebug("Concept map question initQuiz()");
1164 
1165 		var i = 0;
1166 
1167 		// If no inheritence is specified then create everything from scratch
1168 		if(this.strInherit === "") {
1169 			// Demo layout varibles
1170 			this.layoutX = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.x, "configuration x","20"),10);
1171 			this.layoutY = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.y, "configuration y","20"),10);
1172 			this.layoutWidth = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.width, "configuration width","440"),10);
1173 			this.layoutHeight = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.height, "configuration height","220"),10);
1174 
1175 			// Load all the concepts for this concept map
1176 			this.jConcepts = readJSON(configuration.concepts, "concept map concepts",[]);
1177 			this.cMap = new THM_ConceptMap(this.plugin, this.bgLayer, this.jConcepts);
1178 
1179 			// Calculate the drag region for the
1180 			var rectDrag = new Rectangle();
1181 			rectDrag.x = this.layoutWidth - this.cMap.width;
1182 			rectDrag.y = this.layoutHeight - this.cMap.height;
1183 			rectDrag.width = this.layoutX + this.cMap.width - rectDrag.x;
1184 			rectDrag.height = this.layoutY + this.cMap.height - rectDrag.y;
1185 
1186 			// Set the concept map to be dragable
1187 			this.cMap.setDraggable(true);
1188 			this.cMap.setDragRegion(rectDrag.x, rectDrag.y, rectDrag.width, rectDrag.height);
1189 		} else {
1190 			// Look for the parent scene in the scene array
1191 			var parentScene = undefined;
1192 			var parentName = "";
1193 			for (i = 0 ; i < this.scenes.length; i++) {
1194 				parentName = readJSON(this.scenes[i].strName, "inherited name for scene " + i, "");
1195 				if(parentName === this.strInherit) parentScene = i;
1196 			}
1197 
1198 			// If a parent scene was found then reference some of the varibles from that scene
1199 			if ( parentScene !== undefined ) {
1200 				// Reference the layout from the parent scene
1201 				this.layoutX = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].layoutX, "parent scene width","20"),10);
1202 				this.layoutY = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].layoutY, "parent scene height","20"),10);
1203 				this.layoutWidth = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].layoutWidth, "parent scene width","440"),10);
1204 				this.layoutHeight = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].layoutHeight, "parent scene height","220"),10);
1205 
1206 				// Load the concept map from the parent scene
1207 				this.cMap = readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].cMap, "parent scene concept map",undefined)
1208 				this.bgLayer.addChild(this.cMap);
1209 
1210 				// Refernce the global label list from the parent scene
1211 				this.allRelationships = readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].allRelationships, "parent scene relationships",[0,0,0]);
1212 			}
1213 		}
1214 
1215 		// Load non-inheritable varibles from the configuration
1216 		this.textHeight = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.text_height, "configuration text height","50"),10);
1217 		this.tweenX = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.tween_x, "configuration tween x position","20"),10);
1218 		this.tweenY = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.tween_y, "configuration tween y position","20"),10);
1219 		this.currentRelationships = readJSON(configuration.relationships, "configuration relationships",[0,0,0]);
1220 
1221 		// Record the range of the relationships for this question
1222 		this.enableFrom = this.allRelationships.length;
1223 		this.enableTo = this.allRelationships.length + this.currentRelationships.length;
1224 
1225 		// Add all the relationships to the global
1226 		for(i = 0; i < this.currentRelationships.length; i++) {
1227 			this.allRelationships.push(new THM_Relationship(this.plugin, this.cMap, this.currentRelationships[i]));
1228 		}
1229 
1230 		// Create a semi-transparent rectangle behind the instructions to ease readability
1231 		var rectInstruction = new Primitive(this.plugin, "rectangle", 10, 288 - this.textHeight, 460, this.textHeight);
1232 		rectInstruction.setColor(1.0,1.0,1.0,0.8);
1233 		this.bgLayer.addChild(rectInstruction);
1234 	};
1235 
1236 	/**
1237 	Overload the display function for a concept map question.
1238 	@param  {void} Nothing
1239 	@return {void} Nothing
1240 	*/
1241 	this.loadQuiz = function() {
1242 		logDebug("Concept map question loadQuiz()");
1243 
1244 		// Allow dragging and tween the background to the define position
1245 		this.cMap.subscribe();
1246 		this.cMap.addTween("x:"+this.tweenX+",y:"+this.tweenY+",time:1");
1247 
1248 		// Show the answers for any relationships from previous questions
1249 		for(var i = 0; i < this.enableFrom; i++) {
1250 			this.allRelationships[i].showAnswer();
1251 		}
1252 
1253 		// Enable any relationships from this questions
1254 		for(i = this.enableFrom; i < this.enableTo; i++) {
1255 			this.allRelationships[i].enable();
1256 		}
1257 
1258 		// Disable any relationships from future questions
1259 		for(i = this.enableTo; i < this.allRelationships.length; i++) {
1260 			this.allRelationships[i].disable();
1261 		}
1262 	};

1440 /**
1441 A custom button class
1442 @class THM_CustomButton
1443 @param  {object} plugin The monocleGL plugin object.
1444 @param  {string} text The text to display in the button.
1445 @param  {number} x The x position of the button
1446 @param  {number} y The y position of the button
1447 @param  {number} width The width of the button
1448 @param  {number} height The height of the button
1449 @return {void} Nothing
1450 */
1451 function THM_CustomButton(plugin, text, x, y, width, height){
1452 	this.plugin = plugin;
1453 	this.width = width;
1454 	this.height = height;
1455 	this.x = x;
1456 	this.y = y;
1457 	this.text = text;
1458 
1459 	/**
1460 	Setup the custom button and add it to a single layer.  Called internally during creation and only needs to called once.
1461 	@param  {void} Nothing
1462 	@return {void} Nothing
1463 	*/
1464 	this.create = function() {
1465 		// Define all the colors
1466 		this.borderCol = new THM_Color(0,0,0,1);
1467 		this.bgCol = new THM_Color(0.5,0.5,0.5,1);
1468 		this.textCol = new THM_Color(0,0,0,1);
1469 
1470 		// The main layer
1471 		this.layer = new Layer(this.plugin, this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);
1472 		this.layer.setColor(0.0,0.0,0.0,0.0);
1473 		this.id = this.layer.getId();
1474 
1475 		// Create background
1476 		this.background = new Primitive(this.plugin, "rectangle", 0.0, 0.0, this.width, this.height);
1477 		this.background.setColor(this.bgCol.r, this.bgCol.g, this.bgCol.b, this.bgCol.a);
1478 		this.background.setBorderColor(this.borderCol.r, this.borderCol.g, this.borderCol.b, this.borderCol.a);
1479 		this.background.setBorderWidth(2);
1480 		this.layer.addChild(this.background);
1481 
1482 		// Invisible sprite for button actions
1483 		this.inv = new Sprite(this.plugin, "", 0.0, 0.0, this.width, this.height);
1484 		this.inv.setVisibility(false);
1485 		this.inv.subscribe();
1486 		this.layer.addChild(this.inv);
1487 
1488 		// Label for the button
1489 		this.label = new Label(this.plugin, this.text, 12, -2, 2, this.width*2, this.height-4);
1490 		this.label.setVisibility(true);
1491 		this.label.setWrap(true);
1492 		this.label.setColor(0,0,0,0);
1493 		this.label.setCaptionColor(this.textCol.r, this.textCol.g, this.textCol.b, this.textCol.a);
1494 		this.layer.addChild(this.label);
1495 	};
1496 
1497 	/**
1498 	Sets the buttons border color.
1499 	@param  {number} r The new amount of red (range 0 to 1).
1500 	@param  {number} g The new amount of green (range 0 to 1).
1501 	@param  {number} b The new amount of blue (range 0 to 1).
1502 	@param  {number} a The new amount of alpha (range 0 to 1).
1503 	@return {void} Nothing
1504 	*/
1505 	this.setBorderColor = function(r, g, b, a){
1506 		this.borderCol.setColor(r, g, b, a);
1507 		this.background.setBorderColor(r, g, b, a);
1508 	};
1509

1513 	@param  {number} g The new amount of green (range 0 to 1).
1514 	@param  {number} b The new amount of blue (range 0 to 1).
1515 	@param  {number} a The new amount of alpha (range 0 to 1).
1516 	@return {void} Nothing
1517 	*/
1518 	this.setColor = function(r, g, b, a){

1520 		this.background.setColor(r, g, b, a);
1521 	};

1527 	@param  {number} b The new amount of blue (range 0 to 1).

1531 	this.setCaptionColor = function(r, g, b, a){

1590 /**
1591 Safely read JSON objects within a browser with out stopping on error
1592 @class readJSON
1593 @param  {object} jObject The JSON variable we are trying to read.
1594 @param  {string} strType The text to display when jObject is undefined.
1595 @param  {object} objDefault The default variable to return when jObject is undefined.
1596 @return {object} Returns the value of jObject if defined or objDefault when jObject is undefined.
1597 */
1598 function readJSON(jObject, strType, objDefault) {
1599 	var strError = "";
1600 	var rObject = null;
1601 
1602 	// Check if an error message was defined
1603 	if(strType == undefined) {
1604 		strError = "undefined error";
1605 	} else {
1606 		strError = strType;
1607 	}
1608 
1609 	// Check if JSON object exists before reading it
1610 	if(jObject === undefined) {
1611 		logError("WARNING could not read JSON " + strError);
1612 		rObject = objDefault;
1613 	} else {
1614 		rObject = jObject;
1615 	}
1616 
1617 	// Return the JSON object value or an error message
1618 	return rObject;
1619 }
1620 /**
1621 Little wrapper function used to test is the answer is a number
1622 @class isNumber
1623 @param  {object} o The object to test if it's a number.
1624 @return {boolean} True if is a number and false otherwise.
1625 */
1626 function isNumber (o) {
1627   return ! isNaN (o-0);
1628 }
1629 
1630 /**
1631 A custom button class
1632 @class THM_Label
1633 @param  {object} plugin The monocleGL plugin object.
1634 @param  {object} lyrParent The parent layer to add this label to.
1635 @param  {object} jLabel The JSON definetion of the label.
1636 @return {void} Nothing
1637 */
1638 function THM_Label (plugin, lyrParent, jLabel) {
1639 	this.plugin = plugin;
1640 	this.lyrParent = lyrParent;
1641 	this.jLabel = jLabel;
1642 	this.bDropdown = false;
1643 
1644 	/**
1645 	Setup the textbox / drop down and add it to a single layer.  Called internally during creation and only needs to called once.
1646 	@param  {void} Nothing
1647 	@return {void} Nothing
1648 	*/
1649 	this.create = function() {
1650 		// Read the label details from JSON
1651 		this.x = parseInt(readJSON(this.jLabel.x, "label x","0"), 10);
1652 		this.y = parseInt(readJSON(this.jLabel.y, "label y","0"), 10);
1653 		this.width = parseInt(readJSON(this.jLabel.width, "label width","80"), 10);
1654 		this.height = parseInt(readJSON(this.jLabel.height, "label height","20"), 10);
1655 		this.strAnswer = readJSON(this.jLabel.answer, "label answer","").toLowerCase();
1656 		this.bNumber = isNumber(this.strAnswer);
1657 		this.numTolerance = parseFloat(readJSON(this.jLabel.tolerance, "label tolerance","0"));
1658 		if(this.numTolerance < 0) this.numTolerance *= -1;
1659 		this.arrOptions = readJSON(this.jLabel.options, "label options",[""]);
1660 
1661 		// Create the layer for each item
1662 		this.lyrBG = new Layer(this.plugin, this.x, this.y, this.width, 20);
1663 		this.lyrBG.setColor(0,0,0,0);
1664 		this.id = this.lyrBG.id;
1665 
1666 		// The color overlay of the drop down
1667 		this.lyrColor = new Layer(this.plugin, 0, -(20 - this.height), this.width, 20);
1668 		this.lyrColor.setColor(0,0,0,0);
1669 
1670 		if(this.arrOptions.length > 1) {
1671 			// Create the drop down menu for the label
1672 			this.dd = new DropDown(this.plugin, 0, 0, this.width, this.height);
1673 			this.dd.addOption("Select One");
1674 			this.dd.setDefaultOption("Select One");
1675 
1676 			// Set the drop down menu options
1677 			for(var i = 0; i < this.arrOptions.length; i++) {
1678 				this.dd.addOption(this.arrOptions[i]);
1679 			}
1680 			this.bDropdown = true;
1681 		} else {
1682 			this.dd = new TextBox(this.plugin, "", 12, 0, 0, this.width, 20);
1683 			this.bDropdown = false;
1684 		}
1685 
1686 		// Put the drop down and overlay on the background layer
1687 		this.lyrBG.addChild(this.dd);
1688 		this.lyrBG.addChild(this.lyrColor);
1689 		this.lyrParent.addChild(this.lyrBG)
1690 	};
1691 
1692 	/**
1693 	Subscribe the drop down and clear the color overlay.
1694 	@param  {void} Nothing
1695 	@return {void} Nothing
1696 	*/
1697 	this.enable = function() {
1698 		// Subscribe and reset drop down
1699 		this.dd.subscribe();
1700 		if(this.bDropdown) {
1701 			this.dd.setText("Select One");
1702 		} else {
1703 			this.dd.setText("");
1704 		}
1705 
1706 		// Move the layer to the front
1707 		this.lyrParent.removeChild(this.lyrBG);
1708 		this.lyrParent.addChild(this.lyrBG);
1709 
1710 		// Tween the color overlay to be clear
1711 		this.lyrColor.removeTween();
1712 		this.lyrColor.addTween("red:0,green:0,blue:0,alpha:0,time:1");
1713 	};
1714 
1715 	/**
1716 	Unsubscribe the drop down and set a grey color overlay.
1717 	@param  {void} Nothing
1718 	@return {void} Nothing
1719 	*/
1720 	this.disable = function() {
1721 		// Unsubscribe and reset drop down
1722 		this.dd.unsubscribe();
1723 		if(this.bDropdown) {
1724 			this.dd.setText("Select One");
1725 		} else {
1726 			this.dd.setText("");
1727 		}
1728 
1729 		// Tween the color overlay to be grey
1730 		this.lyrColor.removeTween();
1731 		this.lyrColor.addTween("red:0,green:0,blue:0,alpha:0.33,time:1");
1732 	};
1733 
1734 	/**
1735 	Unsubscribe the drop down and set a green color overlay.
1736 	@param  {void} Nothing
1737 	@return {void} Nothing
1738 	*/
1739 	this.showAnswer = function() {
1740 		// Unsubscribe and set drop down to show the answer
1741 		this.dd.unsubscribe();
1742 		this.dd.setText(this.strAnswer);
1743 
1744 		// Tween the color overlay to be red
1745 		this.lyrColor.removeTween();
1746 		this.lyrColor.addTween("red:0.5,green:1.0,blue:0.45,alpha:0.33,time:1");
1747 	};
1748 
1749 	/**
1750 	Check if the drop down is correct and animate the color overlay.
1751 	@param  {void} Nothing
1752 	@return {boolean} True is the user answered this label correctly otherwise false.
1753 	*/
1754 	this.check = function() {
1755 		var bResult;
1756 
1757 		if(this.bNumber) {
1758 			var tbNum = parseFloat(this.dd.getText());
1759 			var answerNum = parseFloat(this.strAnswer);
1760 			bResult = tbNum >= (answerNum - this.numTolerance) && tbNum <= (answerNum + this.numTolerance);
1761 		} else {
1762 			bResult = this.dd.getText().toLowerCase() === this.strAnswer;
1763 		}
1764 
1765 		// Stop and previous tweens and tween the overlay based on the result
1766 		this.lyrColor.removeTween();
1767 		if(bResult) {
1768 			// If correct tween overlay to be green
1769 			this.lyrColor.addTween("red:0.5,green:1.0,blue:0.45,alpha:0.33,time:1");
1770 		} else {
1771 			// If incorrect tween overlay to be red
1772 			this.lyrColor.addTween("red:1.0,green:0.22,blue:0.25,alpha:0.33,time:1");
1773 		}
1774 		// Tween the overlay back to be clear with a 1 second delay
1775 		this.lyrColor.addTween("red:0,green:0,blue:0,alpha:0,delay:1,time:1");
1776 		return bResult;
1777 	};
1778 
1779 	this.create();
1780 }
1781 THM_Label.prototype = new Osmosis();

1783 /**
1784 The label map style question built by JSON
1785 @class THM_LabelingQuestion
1786 @param  {object} plugin The monocleGL plugin object.
1787 @param  {object} configuration The JSON definetion of this question.
1788 @param  {object} thmDemo The refernce to this demo.
1789 @return {void} Nothing
1790 */
1791 function THM_LabelingQuestion (plugin, configuration, thmDemo) {
1792 
1793 	// Scene specfic values
1794 	this.plugin = plugin;
1795 	this.thmDemo = thmDemo;
1796 	this.scenes = this.thmDemo.sceneArray;
1797     this.id = this.plugin.newScene();
1798     this.strInstruction = readJSON(configuration.text, "configuration text","Question text");
1799     this.strName = readJSON(configuration.name, "configuration name","untitled");
1800     this.strInherit = readJSON(configuration.inherit, "configuration inheritence","");
1801 
1802     // Question status flags
1803     this.tries = 3;
1804     this.correct = false;
1805     this.completed = false;
1806     this.serverStatus = false;
1807 
1808 	// Setup the background layer
1809     this.bgLayer = new Layer(this.plugin, 0, 0, 480, 320);
1810     this.bgLayer.setColor(0, 0, 0, 0);
1811 
1812 	// The shared and current label list
1813     this.allLabels = [];
1814     this.currentLabels = [];
1815 
1816     /**
1817 	Trigger when the label map is safe the drag around again.
1818 	@param  {object} that To protect the scope that is this.  Confusing?  Blame javascript.
1819 	@return {void} Nothing
1820 	*/
1821     this.endZoomOut = function(that) {
1822 		// Show the drop down menus and allow dragging
1823 		that.lyrDrop.setVisibility(true);
1824 		that.lyrDrag.subscribe();
1825 
1826 		// Lift up the curtain
1827 		that.thmDemo.hideCurtain();
1828 	}
1829 
1830 	/**
1831 	Triggers when the user clicks on the change display button.
1832 	@param  {number} x The x position of the mouse.
1833 	@param  {number} y The y position of the mouse.
1834 	@return {void} Nothing
1835 	*/
1836 	this.buttonDown = function(x,y) {
1837 		// Toggle the zoom boolean
1838 		this.bZoom = !this.bZoom;
1839 
1840 		// If the animation should be a zoom out
1841 		if(this.bZoom) {
1842 			// Figure out the ratio to shrink the image by
1843 			var rectShrink = new Rectangle();
1844 			rectShrink.width = this.layoutWidth / this.intImageWidth;
1845 			rectShrink.height = this.layoutHeight / this.intImageHeight;
1846 
1847 			// If the width ratio is smaller the height ratio
1848 			if(rectShrink.width < rectShrink.height) {
1849 				// Use the image width ratio to figure out the new image height
1850 				rectShrink.height = this.intImageHeight * rectShrink.width;
1851 				rectShrink.width = this.layoutWidth;
1852 			// Else the width ratio is bigger the height ratio
1853 			} else {
1854 				// Use the image height ratio to figure out the new image width
1855 				rectShrink.width = this.intImageWidth * rectShrink.height;
1856 				rectShrink.height = this.layoutHeight;
1857 			}
1858 
1859 			// Center the image based on the new width and height
1860 			rectShrink.x = this.layoutX + (this.layoutWidth * 0.5) - (rectShrink.width * 0.5);
1861 			rectShrink.y = this.layoutY + (this.layoutHeight * 0.5) - (rectShrink.height * 0.5);
1862 
1863 			// Hide the drop downs and disable dragging
1864 			this.lyrDrop.setVisibility(false);
1865 			this.lyrDrag.unsubscribe();
1866 
1867 			// Tween the label map to it's new size and location
1868 			this.lyrDrag.addTween("x:"+rectShrink.x+",y:"+rectShrink.y+",time:2");
1869 			this.sprImage.addTween("width:"+rectShrink.width+",height:"+rectShrink.height+",time:2");
1870 
1871 			// Show the curtain and delay removing the curtain for 2 seconds
1872 			this.thmDemo.showCurtain();
1873 			setTimeout(function() { this.thmDemo.hideCurtain(); }, 2000);
1874 
1875 		// Else the animation should be a zoom in
1876 		} else {
1877 			// Hide the drop downs and disable dragging
1878 			this.lyrDrop.setVisibility(false);
1879 			this.lyrDrag.unsubscribe();
1880 
1881 			// Tween the label map to it's original size and location
1882 			this.sprImage.addTween("width:"+this.intImageWidth+",height:"+this.intImageHeight+",time:2");
1883 			this.lyrDrag.addTween("x:"+this.tweenX+",y:"+this.tweenY+",time:2");
1884 
1885 			// Show the curtain and delay calling endZoomOut() for 2 seconds
1886 			this.thmDemo.showCurtain();
1887 			setTimeout(this.endZoomOut, 2000, this);
1888 		}
1889 	}
1890 
1891 	/**
1892 	Overload the initialize function for a label map question.
1893 	@param  {void} Nothing
1894 	@return {void} Nothing
1895 	*/
1896 	this.initQuiz = function() {
1897 		logDebug("Label map question initQuiz()");
1898 		var i = 0;
1899 
1900 		// If no inheritence is specified then create everything from scratch
1901 		if(this.strInherit === "") {
1902 			// Demo layout varibles
1903 			this.layoutX = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.x, "configuration x","20"),10);
1904 			this.layoutY = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.y, "configuration y","20"),10);
1905 			this.layoutWidth = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.width, "configuration width","440"),10);
1906 			this.layoutHeight = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.height, "configuration height","220"),10);
1907 
1908 			// The dragable background image for the label
1909 			this.strImage = readJSON(configuration.image, "configuration image","");
1910 			this.intImageWidth = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.image_width, "configuration image width","480"),10);
1911 			this.intImageHeight = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.image_height, "configuration image height","320"),10);
1912 
1913 			// If the image is defined then create the sprite
1914 			if(this.strImage !== "") {
1915 				// Create the background sprite
1916 				this.sprImage = new Sprite(this.plugin, mediaURL + slugUUID + this.strImage, 0, 0, this.intImageWidth, this.intImageHeight);
1917 
1918 				// Create the layer that drags everything added to it
1919 				this.lyrDrag = new Layer(this.plugin, 0, 0, this.intImageWidth, this.intImageHeight);
1920 				this.lyrDrag.setColor(0,0,0,0);
1921 
1922 				// Create the drop down layer that helps control if the drop downs are visiblity
1923 				this.lyrDrop = new Layer(this.plugin, 0, 0, this.intImageWidth, this.intImageHeight);
1924 				this.lyrDrop.setColor(0,0,0,0);
1925 
1926 				// If smaller then the defined layout size
1927 				if(this.layoutWidth >= this.intImageWidth && this.layoutHeight >= this.intImageHeight) {
1928 					// Center the label map in the layout
1929 					var pntDrag = new Point();
1930 					pntDrag.x = this.layoutX + (this.layoutWidth * 0.5) - (this.intImageWidth * 0.5);
1931 					pntDrag.y = this.layoutY + (this.layoutHeight * 0.5) - (this.intImageHeight * 0.5);
1932 					this.lyrDrag.setPosition(pntDrag.x, pntDrag.y);
1933 				// If Larger then the defined layout size
1934 				} else {
1935 					// Set the label map to be dragable
1936 					var rectDrag = new Rectangle();
1937 					rectDrag.x = this.layoutWidth - this.intImageWidth;
1938 					rectDrag.y = this.layoutHeight - this.intImageHeight;
1939 					rectDrag.width = this.layoutX + this.intImageWidth - rectDrag.x;
1940 					rectDrag.height = this.layoutY + this.intImageHeight - rectDrag.y;
1941 					this.lyrDrag.setDrag(undefined, undefined, rectDrag);
1942 				}
1943 
1944 				// Add everything to the scene
1945 				this.lyrDrag.addChild(this.sprImage);
1946 				this.lyrDrag.addChild(this.lyrDrop);
1947 				this.bgLayer.addChild(this.lyrDrag);
1948 
1949 			// If no back ground image is defined then throw an error
1950 			} else {
1951 				logError("Concept map questions require a background image.");
1952 			}
1953 		// If inheritence is specified then reference everything from the define scene
1954 		} else {
1955 			// Look for the parent scene in the scene array
1956 			var parentScene = undefined;
1957 			var parentName = "";
1958 			for (i = 0 ; i < this.scenes.length; i++) {
1959 				parentName = readJSON(this.scenes[i].strName, "inherited name for scene " + i, "");
1960 				if(parentName === this.strInherit) parentScene = i;
1961 			}
1962 
1963 			// If a parent scene was found then reference some of the varibles from that scene
1964 			if ( parentScene !== undefined) {
1965 				// Reference the layout from the parent scene
1966 				this.layoutX = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].layoutX, "parent scene width","20"),10);
1967 				this.layoutY = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].layoutY, "parent scene height","20"),10);
1968 				this.layoutWidth = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].layoutWidth, "parent scene width","440"),10);
1969 				this.layoutHeight = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].layoutHeight, "parent scene height","220"),10);
1970 
1971 				// Reference the image from the parent scene
1972 				this.intImageWidth = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].intImageWidth, "parent scene image width","100"),10);
1973 				this.intImageHeight = parseInt(readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].intImageHeight, "parent scene image height","100"),10);
1974 				this.strImage = readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].strImage, "parent scene image","");
1975 				this.sprImage = readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].sprImage, "parent scene sprite",undefined);
1976 
1977 				// If the image was found then add it to this scene
1978 				if(this.strImage !== "") {
1979 					this.lyrDrag = readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].lyrDrag, "parent scene drag layer","");
1980 					this.lyrDrop = readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].lyrDrop, "parent scene drop down layer","");
1981 					this.bgLayer.addChild(this.lyrDrag);
1982 				}
1983 
1984 				// Refernce the global label list from the parent scene
1985 				this.allLabels = readJSON(this.scenes[parentScene].allLabels, "parent scene labels",[0,0,0]);
1986 			// If no parent scene was for the throw an error
1987 			} else {
1988 				logError("Unable to inherit from the scene " + this.strInherit);
1989 			}
1990 		}
1991 
1992 		// Load non-inheritable varibles from the configuration
1993 		this.textHeight = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.text_height, "configuration text height","50"),10);
1994 		this.tweenX = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.tween_x, "configuration tween x position","20"),10);
1995 		this.tweenY = parseInt(readJSON(configuration.tween_y, "configuration tween y position","20"),10);
1996 		this.currentLabels = readJSON(configuration.labels, "configuration labels",[0,0,0]);
1997 
1998 		// Record the range of the labels for this question
1999 		this.enableFrom = this.allLabels.length;
2000 		this.enableTo = this.allLabels.length + this.currentLabels.length;
2001 
2002 		// Add all the labels to the global
2003 		for(i = 0; i < this.currentLabels.length; i++) {
2004 			this.allLabels.push(new THM_Label(this.plugin, this.lyrDrop, this.currentLabels[i]));
2005 		}
2006 
2007 		// Create and add the zoom button to the answer panel
2008 		this.bButton = false;
2009 		if(this.layoutWidth < this.intImageWidth && this.layoutHeight < this.intImageHeight) {
2010 			this.btnChangeDisplay = new THM_CustomButton(this.plugin, "Zoom", 5, 200, 55, 24);
2011 			this.btnChangeDisplay.setColor(0.2,0.6,0.9,1.0);
2012 			this.btnChangeDisplay.setBorderColor(0.1,0.3,0.6,1.0);
2013 			this.btnChangeDisplay.downCallback(this, "buttonDown");
2014 			this.btnChangeDisplay.unsubscribe();
2015 			this.thmDemo.answerPanelLayer.addChild(this.btnChangeDisplay);
2016 			this.bButton = true;
2017 		}
2018 
2019 		// Create a semi-transparent rectangle behind the instructions to ease readability
2020 		var rectInstruction = new Primitive(this.plugin, "rectangle", 10, 288 - this.textHeight, 460, this.textHeight);
2021 		rectInstruction.setColor(1.0,1.0,1.0,0.8);
2022 		this.bgLayer.addChild(rectInstruction);
2023 	};

2025 	/**
2026 	Overload the display function for a label map question.
2027 	@param  {void} Nothing
2028 	@return {void} Nothing
2029 	*/
2030 	this.loadQuiz = function() {
2031 		logDebug("Label map question loadQuiz()");
2032 
2033 		// Allow dragging and tween the background to the define position
2034 		this.lyrDrag.subscribe();
2035 		this.lyrDrag.addTween("x:"+this.tweenX+",y:"+this.tweenY+",time:1");
2036 
2037 		// Show the drop down menus
2038 		this.lyrDrop.setVisibility(true);
2039 
2040 		// Show the answers for any labels from previous questions
2041 		for(var i = 0; i < this.enableFrom; i++) {
2042 			this.allLabels[i].showAnswer();
2043 		}
2044 
2045 		// Enable any labels from this questions
2046 		for(i = this.enableFrom; i < this.enableTo; i++) {
2047 			this.allLabels[i].enable();
2048 		}
2049 
2050 		// Disable any labels from future questions
2051 		for(i = this.enableTo; i < this.allLabels.length; i++) {
2052 			this.allLabels[i].disable();
2053 		}
2054 
2055 		//  If the button exist then show it and subscribe it
2056 		if(this.bButton) {
2057 			this.btnChangeDisplay.setVisibility(true);
2058 			this.btnChangeDisplay.subscribe();
2059 		}
2060 	};

2077 		}

2257 
2258 /**
2259 The match maker handle the logic to creating and removing connections.
2260 @class THM_MatchMaker
2261 @param  {object} plugin The monocleGL plugin object.
2262 @param  {object} lyrParent The parent layer to add these matches too.
2263 @param  {object} arrObjects The array of the JSON definetions of all the matches.
2264 @param  {number} lines The maximum number of lines needed for this question.
2265 @param  {string} connectionColor The color to change the lines to once they have be connected.
2266 @return {void} Nothing
2267 */
2268 function THM_MatchMaker(plugin, lyrParent, arrObjects, lines, connectionColor) {
2269 	this.plugin = plugin;
2270 	this.lines = lines;
2271 	this.lyrParent = lyrParent;
2272 	this.arrObjects = arrObjects;
2273 	this.connectionColor = connectionColor;
2274 	this.arrPairs = [];
2275 	this.arrConnections = [];
2276 
2277 	/**
2278 	Creates the layer and all the required connection lines.  Called internally during creation and only needs to called once.
2279 	@param  {void} Nothing
2280 	@return {void} Nothing
2281 	*/
2282 	this.create = function() {
2283 
2284 		// Create a background layer for all the lines
2285 		this.bgLayer = new Layer(this.plugin, 0, 0, 480, 320);
2286 		this.bgLayer.setColor(0,0,0,0);
2287 		this.lyrParent.addChild(this.bgLayer);
2288 
2289 		// Create the total number of connections based on the smaller group
2290 		for(var i = 0; i < this.lines; i++) {
2291 			// Create the line for the connection
2292 			this.arrConnections.push(new Line(this.plugin, 0, 0, 480, 320));
2293 			this.arrConnections[i].setColor(this.connectionColor.r, this.connectionColor.g, this.connectionColor.b, this.connectionColor.a);
2294 			this.arrConnections[i].setVisibility(false);
2295 			this.arrConnections[i].setThickness(5);
2296 
2297 			// Append an in use varible and two reference varibles
2298 			this.arrConnections[i].inUse = false;
2299 			this.arrConnections[i].referenceA = -1;
2300 			this.arrConnections[i].referenceB = -1;
2301 
2302 			// Add the line to the layer
2303 			this.bgLayer.addChild(this.arrConnections[i]);
2304 		}
2305 	};
2306 
2307 	/**
2308 	Add a pair by the string and link them to actual objects.
2309 	@param  {string} strRefA The match objects frist part of the pair.
2310 	@param  {string} strRefB The match objects second part of the pair.
2311 	@return {void} Nothing
2312 	*/
2313 	this.addPair = function(strRefA, strRefB) {
2314 		var referenceA = undefined;
2315 		var referenceB = undefined;
2316 
2317 		// Look for the matching numerical references
2318 		for(var i = 0 ; i < this.arrObjects.length; i++) {
2319 			if(this.arrObjects[i].name === strRefA) {
2320 				referenceA = i;
2321 			}
2322 			if(this.arrObjects[i].name === strRefB) {
2323 				referenceB = i;
2324 			}
2325 		}
2326 
2327 		// If no matches where found throw an error
2328 		if(referenceA === undefined || referenceB === undefined) {
2329 			logError("Linking Error, unable to match the pairs " + strRefA + " and " + strRefB + " together");
2330 		// If both matches where found the add the pair to the list
2331 		} else {
2332 			this.arrPairs.push(new THM_Match(referenceA, referenceB))
2333 		}
2334 
2335 	};
2336 
2337 	/**
2338 	Clear previous answers and link the correct answers.
2339 	@param  {void} Nothing
2340 	@return {void} Nothing
2341 	*/
2342 	this.showAnswers = function() {
2343 		// Clear previous connections
2344 		this.resetConnections();
2345 		for ( var i = 0; i < this.arrPairs.length; i++) {
2346 			// Add the correct conection and animate green
2347 			this.addConnection(this.arrPairs[i].referenceA, this.arrPairs[i].referenceB);
2348 			this.arrObjects[this.arrPairs[i].referenceA].showCorrect(true);
2349 			this.arrObjects[this.arrPairs[i].referenceB].showCorrect(true);
2350 		}
2351 	};
2352 
2353 	/**
2354 	Check all the connections and return if correct or not.
2355 	@param  {void} Nothing
2356 	@return {boolean} True if all thematches are correct and false otherwise.
2357 	*/
2358 	this.checkAnswers = function() {
2359 		var count = 0;
2360 		var bResult = false;
2361 
2362 		// Go through each in use connection
2363 		for(var i = 0; i < this.arrConnections.length; i++) {
2364 			if(this.arrConnections[i].inUse) {
2365 
2366 				// Compare each connection to the answer pairs
2367 				bResult = false;
2368 				for( var j = 0; j <	this.arrPairs.length; j++) {
2369 					if((this.arrConnections[i].referenceA === this.arrPairs[j].referenceA &&
2370 					   this.arrConnections[i].referenceB === this.arrPairs[j].referenceB) ||
2371 					   (this.arrConnections[i].referenceB === this.arrPairs[j].referenceA &&
2372 					   this.arrConnections[i].referenceA === this.arrPairs[j].referenceB) ) {
2373 						bResult = true;
2374 					}
2375 				}
2376 
2377 				// If the connection is correct animate green and increment the counter
2378 				if(bResult) {
2379 					count++;
2380 					this.arrObjects[this.arrConnections[i].referenceA].showCorrect(true);
2381 					this.arrObjects[this.arrConnections[i].referenceB].showCorrect(true);
2382 
2383 				// If the connection is incorrect animate red
2384 				} else {
2385 					this.arrObjects[this.arrConnections[i].referenceA].showCorrect(false);
2386 					this.arrObjects[this.arrConnections[i].referenceB].showCorrect(false);
2387 				}
2388 			}
2389 		}
2390 
2391 		// If the counter matches the number of connections return true other wise return false
2392 		return count === this.arrConnections.length;
2393 	};
2394 
2395 	/**
2396 	Clear previous answers and link the correct answers.
2397 	@param  {void} Nothing
2398 	@return {void} Nothing
2399 	*/
2400 	this.resetConnections = function() {
2401 		for( var i = 0; i < this.arrObjects.length; i++) {
2402 			this.removeConnection(i, false);
2403 		}
2404 	};
2405 
2406 	/**
2407 	Remove a connection based on one of the object references
2408 	@param  {number} index The index number of the matchs to remove.
2409 	@param  {boolean} bAnimate If true then animated the color change other just do it.
2410 	@return {void} Nothing
2411 	*/
2412 	this.removeConnection = function(index, bAnimate) {
2413 		// Go though each connection
2414 		for(var i = 0; i < this.arrConnections.length; i++) {
2415 			// Remove the connection if it's in use and one the renfernces match the index
2416 			if(this.arrConnections[i].inUse &&
2417 			  (this.arrConnections[i].referenceA === index ||
2418 			   this.arrConnections[i].referenceB === index) ) {
2419 				// Set all the status flags to be false
2420 				this.arrConnections[i].inUse = false;
2421 				this.arrObjects[this.arrConnections[i].referenceA].selected = false;
2422 				this.arrObjects[this.arrConnections[i].referenceB].selected = false;
2423 
2424 				// Animate to is original color if bAnimate is true
2425 				if(bAnimate) {
2426 					this.arrObjects[this.arrConnections[i].referenceA].originalTween(1.0, 0.0);
2427 					this.arrObjects[this.arrConnections[i].referenceB].originalTween(1.0, 0.0);
2428 				}
2429 				// Reset the references and make the line invisible
2430 				this.arrConnections[i].referenceA = -1;
2431 				this.arrConnections[i].referenceB = -1;
2432 				this.arrConnections[i].setVisibility(false);
2433 
2434 				// Break out of this loop
2435 				break;
2436 			}
2437 		}
2438 	};
2439 
2440 	/**
2441 	Add connection and color the object as disabled for visual cue
2442 	@param  {number} indexA The index number of the first match.
2443 	@param  {number} indexB The index number of the first match.
2444 	@param  {string} disabledColor The color to change the matching line to.
2445 	@return {void} Nothing
2446 	*/
2447 	this.addConnection = function(indexA, indexB, disabledColor) {
2448 		// If both indexes are valid
2449 		if(indexA >= 0 && indexB >= 0) {
2450 			// Remove a previous connection if exists on idnex A
2451 			if( this.arrObjects[indexA].selected ) {
2452 				this.removeConnection(indexA, true);
2453 			}
2454 			// Remove a previous connection if exists on idnex A
2455 			if( this.arrObjects[indexB].selected ) {
2456 				this.removeConnection(indexB, true);
2457 			}
2458 
2459 			// Set the two objects to be selected
2460 			this.arrObjects[indexA].selected = true;
2461 			this.arrObjects[indexB].selected = true;
2462 
2463 			// Go through each connection
2464 			for(var i = 0; i < this.arrConnections.length; i++) {
2465 				// If the connection is free to be used
2466 				if(!this.arrConnections[i].inUse) {
2467 					// Set the connection to be in use
2468 					this.arrConnections[i].inUse = true;
2469 
2470 					// Record the indexes as references
2471 					this.arrConnections[i].referenceA = indexA;
2472 					this.arrConnections[i].referenceB = indexB;
2473 
2474 					// If the disabledColor was defined then tween both objects to be that color
2475 					if(disabledColor !== undefined) {
2476 						this.arrObjects[indexA].colorTween(disabledColor.r, disabledColor.g, disabledColor.b, disabledColor.a, 1.0, 0.0);
2477 						this.arrObjects[indexB].colorTween(disabledColor.r, disabledColor.g, disabledColor.b, disabledColor.a, 1.0, 0.0);
2478 					}
2479 
2480 					// Draw the connection line inbtween the two anchors and make the line visible
2481 					this.arrConnections[i].setPosition(this.arrObjects[indexA].anchorX, this.arrObjects[indexA].anchorY);
2482 					this.arrConnections[i].setDimensions(this.arrObjects[indexB].anchorX, this.arrObjects[indexB].anchorY);
2483 					this.arrConnections[i].setVisibility(true);
2484 
2485 					// Break out of this loop
2486 					break;
2487 				}
2488 			}
2489 		}
2490 	};
2491 
2492 	this.create();
2493 }
2494 THM_MatchMaker.prototype = new Osmosis();
